As the name suggests, the game focuses squarely on the World Cup tournament which takes place in Japan and Korea (May 31 to June 30 2002). Though FIFA 2002 featured a Road to the World Cup mode, players who wanted to take their favorite national team to victory were out of luck: qualification was as far as you could go. 2002 FIFA World Cup picks up where the old game left off and brings the excitement of the tournament home like no other game.
title: 2002 FIFA World Cup

description: Britney's about to launch her next concert tour and she needs backup dancers. Audition to Britney's most popular songs to see if you can keep up with the other dancers. If you're really good, you'll get access to exclusive video footage and concert footage. Only the best dancers will get to join Britney on stage. Includes your favorite Britney songs like Oops, I Did It Again, Baby One More Time, her latest hit, I'm a Slave 4 U, and more.
title: Britney's Dance Beat

description:
Meet Cate Archer, a deadly secret agent in charge of overthrowing the lethal terrorist organization known as H.A.R.M. Ported from the PC original,

boasts four exclusive levels designed specifically for the PlayStation 2 in addition to the more than 60 existing stages and 15 action-packed missions. Travel the globe during the 1960s Cold War era and gain access to 30 unique weapons including assault rifles, crossbows, grenade launchers, and several others. Commandeer snowmobiles or Triumph motorcycles to make quick getaways and mow down enemy agents, and use such bizarre items as exploding lipstick, robot poodles, and other handy gadgets in your quest to save the free world.
title: The Operative: No One Lives Forever

description: An extreme sports title that centers on inline skating, Aggressive Inline features seven massive levels, a comprehensive stage editor, and a licensed soundtrack. Also available for the Microsoft Xbox and Nintendo GameCube.
title: Aggressive Inline

description: Rally Trophy is a challenging racing game and the first "historic" rally simulation. Included are such classics as the Fiat 600 Abarth and the Morris Mini Cooper, along with 9 others.  An emphisis has been placed on recreating real-world physics as well.
title: Rally Trophy

description: The Sum Of All Fears games will be based on events from both Tom Clancy's novel and Paramount Pictures' movie, immersing players in the middle of a high-stakes adventure as members of an FBI elite hostage rescue team reassigned to track down the conspirators of a major plot against the United States. Players can choose to play as part of a three-player team or up to 36 players can join the multiplayer action on the ubi.com gaming portal as well as the internet. The game takes place in a number of modern day locations, including West Virginia, the Middle East, and South Africa, and allows players to follow the story of The Sum Of All Fears via rendered cinematics depicting vital plot points from the novel and movie.
title: The Sum of All Fears

description:
Mob bosses need favors, crooked cops need help, the street gangs want you dead; so to compensate you'll have to rob, steal, and kill in order to stay alive, while using your resources to track down the woman who betrayed you and earn your rightful revenge. But that's all in a day's work in Rockstar Games' ambitious PS2 sequel,

. Developed by DMA Design,

is the first installment of the series to utilize a fully three-dimensional living city with open environments and non-linear gameplay. Additional features include a cast of hundreds of different characters, more than 50 types of vehicles, three hours of professionally recorded music, and a huge array of deadly street weapons.
title: Grand Theft Auto III
platforms: PC PS4 GBA Xbox iPhone Mac Android PS3 PS2
rating_content: Blood, Animated Violence, Realistic Blood, Realistic Violence, Strong Language

description: Do you have the patience and discipline to compete with the best golfer in the game? Quite possibly the best athlete ever to compete on the links, Tiger Woods lends his expertise to this detailed GBA experience. Play as Woods or any of 11 other top tour professionals, trying to beat out the competition with a combination of consistency and explosiveness. The setting is the famous TPC Sawgrass Stadium course, and it looks just like its real-life counterpart. Boasting incredible near-3D graphics, TIGER WOODS PGA TOUR GOLF has all of the elements of a real round: wind conditions, plenty of clubs to choose from, realistic hazards, and more. What makes the game even better is the true-to-life physics model, which allows for a thoroughly satisfying outing. Square off a against a field of tough AI opponents, practice a few holes by yourself, or link up and get as many as four virtual golfers chipping and putting.
title: Tiger Woods PGA Tour Golf

description: Dragon Ball Z - The Legacy of Goku will take you on an incredible journey to protect the Universe from the evil Frieza once and for all! You?ll use combat strategies to help fulfill the Legacy of Goku, the greatest warrior the Universe has ever known!The kidnapping of Goku?s son Gohan threatens the safety of the Universe. The future depends on your ability to use your powers to help Goku? defeat his enemies. Get ready to Power Up!
title: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy of Goku

description: Virtua Striker 3 Version 2002 is the only arcade-style soccer title for the home and it kicks!  Perform high-flying bicyle kicks, headers and shoot-outs while hearing the chants of the crowd for the first soccer game to come to Nintendo GameCube.
title: Virtua Striker 2002
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description: 3DO's famous green plastic soldiers move into the realm of real-time strategy in Army Men RTS. On a mission to defeat a colonel who has defected to the enemy, you command a number of units including infantry and several types of vehicles. Guide your elite corps of plastic troops across toy-proportioned battlefields such as a house's front yard, living room, and attic. Collect plastic and electricity resources to build structures and additional units. Use your radio call unit to bring death from above in the form of paratroopers or the dreaded magnifying glass which melts enemy forces. Army Men RTS features a number of single-player campaign missions, a tutorial, and a multiplayer mode for up to eight players.
title: Army Men: RTS

description: In search of dancers for her upcoming tour, Britney wants you to audition. Earn your place on stage by rhythmically pressing buttons to the beat of Britney?s hit songs, showing off your hottest moves. The best part is, as you beat songs, you unlock exclusive Britney videos and interviews. With a two-player mode, compete against your friends to see who?s best at getting their groove on. Do you have the right moves?
title: Britney's Dance Beat

description: Gauntlet Dark Legacy is the all-new 3D iteration in the time-honored "hack'n'slash" classic Gauntlet franchise. The revolutionary Gauntlet game design allows you to work in a team and venture through eight dangerous worlds. One to four players can select one of eight different characters. Using force of arms and exotic magical powers, you vanquish creatures, search for treasure, evade traps, and embark on quests.
title: Gauntlet: Dark Legacy
platforms: Xbox GCN PS2 Arcade GBC GBA

description: Hot on the heels of FIFA Soccer 2002, Electronic Arts has readied a World Cup-themed alternate version of the game. As the name suggests, the game focuses squarely on the World Cup tournament which takes place in Japan and Korea (May 31 to June 30 2002). Though FIFA 2002 featured a Road to the World Cup mode, players who wanted to take their favorite national team to victory were out of luck: qualification was as far as you could go. 2002 FIFA World Cup picks up where the old game left off and brings the excitement of the tournament home like no other game.
title: 2002 FIFA World Cup

description: Kasparov in your pocket! The most brilliant chess player ever will be your personal trainer, sharing with you his technical knowledge and the history of the game... Can you raise the challenge and play head to head against him?
title: Virtual Kasparov
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description:
Not content with continuing Goemon's "super-deformed" adventures in a pseudo-ancient Japan populated with mechanical dolls and traditional fantasy creatures, Konami has decided to give Goemon a makeover. Goemon is no longer short and squat, he's now tall and "cool." He no longer lives in the past, but rather in the Japan of the future. His sidekick is no longer a bumbling idiot named Ebisumaru, but rather a cute little girl named Ebisu. I can't help but think of the movie

-- Goemon got hollywoodized. The whimsical warrior wannabe of old is gone, replaced with a hip platform superstar. The core portion of the game plays like every platformer from the early '90s.  The mech fighting is still there, you still visit towns, explore underwater levels, and the backgrounds are nicely drawn.
title: Goemon: New Age Shutsudo

description: In this third-person action game based on Sam Raimi's blockbuster movie, players assume the role of Peter Parker and his alter-ego Spider-man to defend the city from the clutches of evil. The game starts off with Peter in his wrestling costume, but soon as has players learn and master all-new combat moves, webslinging and dizzying airborne acrobatics. Move through stunning scenes from the movie as you explore enormous city environments with newfound maneuverability. Battle the world's toughest villains, including Shocker, Vulture, and the Green Goblin. The game features unlockable secrets like mini games, new costumes and DVD extra features. The Xbox version includes two bonus levels not found in the other releases.
title: Spider-Man: The Movie
platforms: Xbox GBA GBA PC GCN PS2

description: In this third-person action game based on Sam Raimi's blockbuster movie, players assume the role of Peter Parker and his alter-ego Spider-man to defend the city from the clutches of evil. The game starts off with Peter in his wrestling costume, but soon as has players learn and master all-new combat moves, webslinging and dizzying airborne acrobatics. Move through stunning scenes from the movie as you explore enormous city environments with newfound maneuverability. Battle the world's toughest villains, including Shocker, Vulture, and the Green Goblin. The game features unlockable secrets like mini games, new costumes and DVD extra features.
title: Spider-Man: The Movie
platforms: GCN GBA GBA PC PS2 Xbox

description: Through nine unique and extreme environments, players fly in aerial combat both in and above the atmospheres of the galaxy's planets in free roaming and land fixed play modes. Players will need to successfully complete 22 intense missions and survive fierce air-to-air and air-to-land battles with an alien race in order to save their plane. A step-by-step training mode gives the best techniques and tactics to destroy enemy aircraft and perform land-based attacks.
title: Star X
rating_content: Mild Animated Violence, Mild Realistic Violence

description: The Disney or Pixar team is at it again, and this time they've created an animated motion picture that's all about monsters! Of course, that's the perfect occasion for a video game, and thus the release of this delightful title inspired by the film. The object of the game is to make your way through each level by scaring humans (any monster worth his salt can scare a few measly humans, right?), collecting items, and discovering hidden areas. The setting jumps back and forth between Monsteropolis and the real world, resulting in 10 of the craziest levels anyone's ever laid eyes on. There are tons of puzzles to solve, characters to meet, and puzzles to unlock and solve throughout the adventure, and you can access all of your progress by entering a password on the main menu. The game is for one player only, but who needs real friends when you can hand out with the coolest monsters ever? Some monsters want to keep you up at night, but these guys are just trying to scare up a little fun.
title: Monsters, Inc.

description: Tac Ops: Assault on Terror is a counter-terrorism first person shooter (FPS) powered by the Unreal Engine, published by Microprose. It began its life as a mod for the popular FPS, Unreal Tournament, created by a team of video game fans from all over the world who simply worked on it for the love of the game. Originally known as SWAT, then Tactical Ops, and now Tac Ops: Assault on Terror, the project began in late 1999, and its first release, Beta 1 was released freely over the Internet in June of 2000. Tac Ops: Assault on Terror is designed to be sold in stores, and also be freely distributed to all players of Unreal Tournament, downloaded as a seperate patch.
title: Tac Ops: Assault on Terror

description: If you remember the incredible action scenarios of the original DIE HARD movie, you know just how overdue another DIE HARD game is. You'll play as John McClane, the New York cop trapped in a Los Angles Christmas party gone wrong. Terrorists have overtaken the office building, and you've got to use each of the 40 floors of the Plaza to defeat them and free the hostages. Marked by its truly astounding 3D graphics and action-packed gameplay, DIE HARD: Nakatomi Plaza is perfect for gamers and cinema fans alike.
title: Die Hard: Nakatomi Plaza

description: It's time for another remix of DANCE DANCE REVOLUTION, and this one's only available on the PlayStation. Using an optional dance mat (which isn't included  the regular controller works, too), you'll have to perform a list of dance moves perfectly in order to move on to the next round. The screen will provide you with four columns each representing an area of the mat (or button combo). Score points by nailing the timing of each step and getting the order of moves correct. The action will get faster and more furious as the game progresses, instructing you to pull off trickier combos in more limited time periods. This version boasts improved gameplay, a new Work Out mode, and features over 50 hot tunes that will help you get your groove on. REVOLUTION continues to gain popularity since its original introduction in Japan, and KONAMIX is the best PlayStation installment to date.
title: Dance Dance Revolution Konamix

description:
A compilation of the once-ignored RPG series (which was passed up by an early, RPG-unfriendly SCEA), featuring all three chapters in the Arc the Lad Saga as well as a Working Designs' treasure-pack of extras.

In ancient times, people understood the delicate balance that existed between the physical world and the five Guardians, (Earth, Fire, Water, Wind, and Light), who watched over humanity. In time, the Romalians, bent on global conquest, began to shatter the balance that existed between the two worlds. Only by using the power of the Ancient Ark to stem the dark tide will humanity have any hope of life.

The only one that possesses the power to use the Ark is a young lad named, oddly enough, Arc. Arc has been consumed with learning the fate of his missing and beloved father. Now, Arc shall embark on a quest to discover what really happened that fateful night ten years ago. Along the way, he'll meet many new friends who shall become powerful allies. But does this slight lad really have the strength to find the power stones, rally the Guardians, and wield the power of the Ark? Only time will tell.
title: Arc the Lad Collection

description: Jane's Attack Squadron is a next generation World War II flight combat simulation where take control of a number of pivotal battles in the European Theater of Operations, from either the Allied or Axis side. Missions include air strikes on a wide range of targets including warships, subs, trains, tanks, airfields, and factories. Other mission types add variety, and include Patrol, Intercept, and Strategic Bombing.
title: Jane's Attack Squadron

description: A must-have for Alfred Hitchcock fans has arrived. Make your way through puzzles, clues and even clips from films in the Alfred Hitchcock world in this adventure game for the PC. For gamers and movie buffs, this game isn't one, but many Alfred Hitchcock movies compiled together to make a game worth playing. Do you have what it takes or are you too scared?
title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents: The Final Cut

description: Inspired by the restaurant whose slogan is "Delightfully Tacky, Yet Unrefined," this game is more than just a road trip -- it's the ultimate race. There can truly be no reward as fulfilling as getting to hang out with the Hooters waitresses, and that's what you'll get if you can manage to keep your mind on the track and win a few races in Hooters Road Trip. Choose your muscle car and head out into competition, trying to outrun the other guys in a series of driving tests. There are more than a dozen cars (some have to be unlocked through skilled driving), and races will take you to such places as Florida and California. The promise of meeting the Hooters girls is quite a bit of incentive, and the computer AI opponents respond accordingly.
title: Hooters Road Trip

description: It's time to get out your board and hit the waves with TransWorld Surf. Pull off massive air, wicked tricks and awesome tailslides just like the pros of surfing. With amazingly realistic water, it's time to hit one of 20 breaks to see if you have what it takes to impress the people on the beach. It's totally awesome dude!
title: TransWorld Surf

description: It would be great enough to get to play as Spider-Man in a video game, but this GBA take on the comic book lets you play as Tobey Maguire playing Spider-Man! Confused? Well, this video game is based on the motion picture version of the comic, which means there are plenty of modern-day updates to the time-honored saga. Certain things never change, however, and Green Goblin is still Spidey's evil arch-nemesis. The action takes place in (where else?) New York City, and there's plenty of web slinging and wall crawling to keep aspiring superheroes busy. Unfortunately, Green Goblin isn't the enemy you'll encounter; Shocker, Vulture, and a series of mechanized meanies from good old Oscorp Industries will try to stop you throughout the adventure. Not to worry: With an endless supply of webbing, plus your bare fists and tireless legs, there's no one you can't defeat. Can you save the city from certain peril?
title: Spider-Man: The Movie
platforms: GBA PC GCN PS2 PS2 Xbox

description: In this third-person action game based on Sam Raimi's blockbuster movie, players assume the role of Peter Parker and his alter-ego Spider-man to defend the city from the clutches of evil. The game starts off with Peter in his wrestling costume, but soon as has players learn and master all-new combat moves, webslinging and dizzying airborne acrobatics. Move through stunning scenes from the movie as you explore enormous city environments with newfound maneuverability. Battle the world's toughest villains, including Shocker, Vulture, and the Green Goblin. The game features unlockable secrets like mini games, new costumes and DVD extra features.
title: Spider-Man: The Movie
platforms: PS2 GBA GBA PC GCN Xbox

description:
Finally, a videogame that understands soccer really is a contact sport.

RedCard 20-03's unique adrenaline-style gameplay lets you kick, score, celebrate and tackle your way through 50 international teams all vying for the Cup Championship.

The unique Midway Sports-style experience combined with lightning game speed, stunning next-generation graphics and authentic soccer action make RedCard 20-03 the must-have soccer title on the next-gen systems.
title: RedCard 20-03

description: The popular Super NES RPG continues with the next epic quest in the Breath of Fire series. Re-enter the magical life of hero Ryu, a dragon morphing warrior, as he unknowingly embarks on a vast adventure in search of his missing father and little sister. Eight characters will join you along the way to help you find and master the hidden secrets of the vast landsyou will explore. Discover how the right combinations of magical spells, strength, wisdom, guts and luck will come into play in determining your fate as you roam the world of dragons, demons and mystery. A new "community system" lets you build and develop your own town. Supports the Link Cable for item exchanges.
title: Breath of Fire II
platforms: GBA SNES Wii U Wii New 3DS

description: Based on a 1969 British film of the same name, THE ITALIAN JOB is packed with the sort of retro style and high-adrenaline plots that will have people talking about it for years to come. Structured like a full-length movie, this third-person driving adventure blends classic storytelling with high AI and creative challenges to create a gripping ride. Like any good car-chase flick, the game has you weaving in and out of traffic (auto and pedestrian), navigating city streets and rural environments alike. Taking place in London, Turin, and the Swiss Alps, THE ITALIAN JOB's main plot involves you stealing a bunch of gold bullion without the Mafia or the local police noticing. This will require speeding around in the sewers, jumping about on the rooftops, and doing whatever it takes to confuse your pursuers. You'll be driving as many as 13 different vehicles throughout the chase (mini-Coopers are among them), which means you'll have to adjust to the different physics of each.
title: The Italian Job
platforms: PS PS2 GCN PC Xbox Cell

description: Earthworm Jim returns in a madcap chase across the galaxy saving cows and thwarting lawyers all the way. Whip, run, jump and Snot swing your way through 10 of the most outrageous and untraditional levels anywhere. Returning favorite characters include; Princess What's-Her-Name, Psy-Crow, Peter Puppy, Bob the Goldfish, and several new villains as well! See Jim in disguise as blind cave salamander (no, really?we're not kidding on this one!). Earthworm Jim 2 is crazy, action-packed and senselessly humorous fun for all ages.
title: Earthworm Jim 2
platforms: GBA SNES Gen PS PC Wii Saturn

description: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind is an epic, open-ended single-player roleplaying game set in a gigantic 3D world where you create and play any kind of character you can imagine. Be the noble hero embarking on an epic quest, or an insidious thief rising to leadership of his guild. Be a malevolent sorcerer developing the ultimate spell of destruction, or a reverent healer searching for the cure to a plague. Your actions define your character, and your gameplay changes and evolves in response to your actions. Confront the assassins' guild, and they take out a contract on you. Impress them, and they try to recruit you instead. No two sagas are the same in the world of Morrowind.
title: The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind

description:
After the Great War, tensions rise and an assault on your homeland ensues. The enemy has swept ashore and is bent on conquering your tiny nation. You parachute onto a tiny island with the mission of interdicting passing enemy supply ships and troop transports, preventing the invading force from subjugating your country.

Featuring a variety of vintage weaponry from the era, in Operation Blockade you earn more advanced weaponry as you progress through the game. This is critical as time continues towards the latter half of the decade, a military build-up and the next battle storm. Facing you are air, land and sea forces that rival those of any nation. Carriers and their deadly assortment of fighter-attack planes and bombers; paratroopers, PT boats, submarines and landing craft all set out to eradicate your small blocking force.
title: Operation Blockade

description:
EA Sports Big, the label known for leading-edge extreme sports titles, speeds into the world of extreme motocross with Freekstyle 2002. If you don't have the guts to hit a 40-foot launch at 70 mph, you don't belong here, 'cause that's the only way to grab the big air you need to pull off 80 insane freestyle tricks. There's no room for fear.

Real-life riders like Mike Metzger, Clifford "The Flyin' Hawaiian" Adpptante, and Jessica Patterson are available to choose from, each with his or her own bike, outfit, and riding style. Ride through nine venues looking for hidden shortcuts, or roam freely over the freestyle tracks. Master the moves to earn the points and speed boosts familiar to extreme sports games. You can also challenge a second player to race via split-screen.
title: Freekstyle

description: Capcom continues Mega Man's cyber adventure series with more online chaos. Return to the futuristic universe inside cyber space and join Mega Man.EXE in the battle to fight cyber crimes in this mega role playing adventure. This time, there is a new net crime organization in town and its computer hacking has created a virus that's quickly gaining momentum. It's up to Mega Man.EXE, his pal Lan and friends to join the Net-battlers and win this new cyber battle. Stop it before it spreads! The game serves up hidden and more varied Battle Chips to discover, collect and trade with your friends (via Link Cable). Also supports two-player link-up tournaments.
title: Mega Man Battle Network 2

description: This isn't your grandfather's FROGGER, to be certain; taking the time-tested premise of the coin-operated favorite, FROGGER: The Great Quest translates the action to pure 3D, with dozens of gameplay hours to keep you hopping. Frogger, as it goes, has grown weary of his life in the old Firefly Swamp, and he sets out on a grand adventure to find the girl of his dreams a princess whose kiss can transform the green guy into a real prince. Aided by his Fairy Frogmother and the three wishes she's granted him, Frogger will have to traverse 20 gigantic levels of varied terrain. You'll try to lead our hero to journey's end without falling prey to the scores of villains that stand in the way. In another departure from the original game, Frogger has a weapon: He can spit a gooey substance from his mouth in order to deter foes. Throw in some truly horrific (and hilarious) cutscenes, and you've got one incredible game.
title: Frogger Advance: The Great Quest
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description: E.T. is in serious trouble, and needs your help! You must race against time to save him from the government agents, scientists and law enforcement officers that are trying to catch him. YOUR MISSION: Assemble the transmitter that will allow E.T. to "phone home", then arrange for him to be picked up by his spaceship before it's too late! E.T. needs your help; go save him?
title: E.T. The Extra-Terrestrial

description: Reap the rewards of racing through an entire season of pulse pounding motocross action while upgrading your gear and bike along the way. For free ride madness compete in the all-new freestyle career mode dazzling the crowd with new tricks and sick maneuvers. Or simply ride the open terrain searching for secret areas without the burden of competition. It?s your bike - now ride!
title: MX Superfly

description: An arcade-style golf game, Outlaw Golf features numerous comic golfers competing on unusual courses, such as a swamp where your caddy can be munched on by a "friendly" gator.
title: Outlaw Golf
rating_content: Mature Sexual Themes, Mild Animated Violence, Mild Realistic Violence, Strong Language

description: With professional riders to choose from and authentic courses modeled using actual satellite data players will be able to race, pull amazing tricks, and compete for fame in freestyle mode or open terrain.
title: MX Superfly

description: F1 2002 will be the first Formula One game to feature the new 2002 season when it launches. Officially licensed by Formula One Administration Limited, it features real drivers, teams, cars and tracks from the 2002 FIA Formula One World Championship and it will be available at the start of the brand new season allowing the true Formula One aficionado the opportunity to play along as the real life drama unfolds.
title: F1 2002

description: Created by PuzzleKings, ZooCube takes puzzlers to a whole new dimension - the third dimension. Around the world, animals have been transformed by shape-altering science experiments and need help in returning to their natural state. Players use their ZooCube to rescue and return the animals to the flying ark.
title: ZooCube

description: Test Drive is reborn with more racing action and thrills than anything before. Race through four international cities in more than 20 high-end sports cars as you sprint for the checkered flag and all the glory that goes with it. Remember, though, you'll have to watch out for more than just the competition: traffic, pedestrians, and especially the cops who can take you out of a race in a split second if you aren't careful. The excitement, intensity, and danger of street racing are yours for the taking with Test Drive.
title: Test Drive

description: Step right up and get your frag on with QUAKE III: Arena for the MAC. Choose from a variety of weapons and a ton of maps and turn your opponents into dripping piles of flesh. You've got three gameplay options to choose from: against bots, a split-screen Four-Player mode, and network play, where you can go online and strut your stuff against some of the best players in the country. If you liked QUAKE III: Arena on the PC, then you're going to love it on the MAC.
title: Quake III: Arena
platforms: Mac PC DC PS2 NDS Xbox 360

description:
In the year 2050 China has become the world's deadliest power and has squashed all resistance with brutal force while attempting to build a new super technology that will render world peace obsolete. The only team on the planet that can end this threat is yours, and so begins BAM! Entertainment's intense flight actioner,

! Using the latest in PS2 technology,

offers a playable area of more than 1600 square kilometers in realistic locations like Columbia, Kazakhstan, North Africa, and China itself. A variety of high-technology air and ground combat craft are yours to control, as players pilot their escort fighters, recon planes, battle tanks, and state of the art

all over the world.
title: Dropship: United Peace Force

description: Adopting a dog should be one of the most rewarding experiences in a child's life. Young Lilo a Hawaiian girl who sets out to get her very own canine receives a bit of a shock when she discovers that her new pup is actually a space alien in disguise! Stitch, an extra-terrestrial criminal, was in transport to an intergalactic prison when his ship crashed on Earth. Now, he's hiding two of his six legs and posing as a pooch in order to evade the alien police. Play as both Lilo and Stitch in this adaptation of the animated Disney film of the same name. Each successive level alternates between the two characters, and the gameplay is completely different depending on which of the delightful personalities you inhabit; Stitch's levels are straight-ahead 2D scrolling adventures, while Lilo's boards focus on near-3D puzzle solving and creative mind benders. The graphics are cool throughout the whole journey, and the gameplay is completely addicting. Whether or not you've seen the movie, you'll fall in love with LILO & STITCH.
title: Lilo & Stitch

description: Gore is a first-person 3D action shooter. Its involved storyline moves the player through three different episodes: post-apocalyptic Earth, medieval Earth, and an alien homeworld. Each environment has its own style and content, including new monsters, weapons and abilities. Gore has indoor, outdoor, low-gravity environments and more.
title: Gore: Ultimate Soldier

description: Extreme Paintbrawl 4 features 12 characters playing across 12 immerse levels. The game supports sound EFX and gameplay modes such as Center Flag, Capture the Flag, Elimination and Gauntlet in addition to the online multi-player modes that the game also hosts.
title: Extreme PaintBrawl 4

description: The Ring Has A New King! Climb into the squared circle and go head-to-head with the baddest bunch of boxers around. Duck, jab and clobber your way to the championship title!
title: Punch King

description: Take control of many of your favourite wrestlers in this re-developed version of the upcoming PS2 title. The game features 42 legendary wrestlers, and allows players to link deadly combos together with a single button press. The game also features Create-a-Legend mode, in-depth match analysis and career guidance by real managers, five match types, career modes, wrestler customising, interactive ring entrances and much more.
title: Legends of Wrestling

description: Get behind the wheel of the world's most famous monster trucks with a brutal arsenal of weapons and go head-to-head in savage vehicular combat. Jump in, hold on, and grind it out through interactive arenas with multiple sub-levels, tricks, traps, and surprises.  Choose any of your favorite licensed Monster Trucks, including Grave Digger, Bulldozer, Gunslinger, Predator, Wild Thang and more. Play for total carnage as you master your tricks of play including a Freestyle session and the no-holds-barred Championship mode where your rewards pay off in the ultimate in Monster Truck Destruction.
title: Monster Jam: Maximum Destruction

description: With countless traps to avoid, rooms to explore, puzzles to solve and mysteries to uncover, each lurking horror survived will take you closer to the source of the RESIDENT EVIL. Survival is your only option.
title: Resident Evil Gaiden

description: Players choose to step into the ring as of one of 16 currently active professional or 4 custom boxers in this realistic heavyweight boxing simulation. Designed as a complete sports action game that will appeal to both boxing enthusiasts and video game fans alike, Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing brings the heavyweight division to brutal reality with its gritty graphics and dazzling animation engine. Also boasting a unique -- unlock system, players will have the opportunity to earn additional boxers, taunts, themes and signature moves as they move up through the ranks. Best of all, players have the option of assuming the role of the mighty 'Iron' Mike Tyson himself, or taking on his console counterpart for the heavyweight championship title.
title: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing

description: Can you save society from criminals? Play as Konoko, an agent of the Tech Crimes Task Force, as you make your way through level after stunning level in pursuit of the bad guys. Taking a page from anime classics and modern day action movies, ONI presents a rich, involved action or adventure story to keep you playing for days on end. Featuring full-contact action, the game emphasizes both gunplay and hand-to-hand fighting. Each level has been planned and executed by architects using the AutoCAD system, resulting in a high degree of realistic detail and thoughtful design.
title: Oni

description: The Skaarj war is over, but fighting between the different factions and the mysterious and bloodthirsty Phayder are escalating. A Tournament is held to contain competition. Soon, this turns from a few gladiatorial combats between convicts into major public events and the biggest source of income for the Liandri Corporation. Several factions will be competing in this year's tournament, each with their motives. You are a member of one of them, and must prove to be worthy of facing Xan Kriegor himself in each of the 43 maps, mastering the 11 weapons at your disposal and confronting the most powerful computer AI to date - or your friends in multiplayer mode.
title: Unreal Tournament [1999]
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

description: The year is 1812. Napoleon's army is on the march, and it's every empire for itself. As "Supreme Commander," you'll seize territories, crush your enemies, and betray your allies in a fast-paced, ruthless quest for world domination. Play the Classic Game under the familiar rules, trading cards for armies and rolling the dice to outdo your opponent. Play the Simultaneous-Turn option for a whole new Risk experience that includes I-COM communication and negotiation features, territory depth enhancements and territory bidding. Risk II is the ultimate form of this game of world domination that people of all ages have enjoyed for forty years!
title: Risk II

description: Building upon the foundation set by the earlier games of the MADDEN series, MADDEN 2000 sports an increased framerate, more detailed player models, and a more in-depth Franchise mode. If you're looking for something different, you can try the Madden Challenge mode, which challenges gamers to complete objectives like recovering an onside kick or scoring first in overtime. If you complete these objectives you are given points, which you can then use to purchase players or stadiums.
title: Madden NFL 2000
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description: Majesty is a unique sim putting you in the crushed velvet hot seat of your own kingdom. With an epic quest before you, you make the decisions of where to build your settlement's guilds and temples. From these you recruit a varied cast of larger-than-life heroes. Each one has a mind of his own and must be enticed to meet your goals, via rewards you offer and spells you cast. Meanwhile you must make sure that your treasury stays flush with cash to support these and other outlays necessary to maintain a thriving medieval town. The fact that you are being barraged by attacks from mythical beasts and fantastic creatures doesn't make your job any easier.
title: Majesty: The Fantasy Kingdom

description:
From Sammy, the developer behind Guilty Gear X, comes Lethal Skies. Originally released in Japan under the name Sidewinder F back in December, Lethal Skies is an air combat game. With gameplay that reminiscent of the Ace Combat series and visuals to match, Lethal Skies puts players in a world suffering from global warming. In this dark world a sinister group called the World Order Reorganization Front (WORF) has risen from nothingness and taken power. Taking on the role of a pilot for the International Alliance elite Team SW, players must destroy the WORF by any means necessary.

Featuring over 20 missions, 13 aircrafts (including the F-15, F-16, F-18, F-22 and the Su-27) and intense air-to air combat, Lethal Skies is one title that no PlayStation 2 owner should go without.
title: Lethal Skies: Elite Pilot -- Team SW

description:
Developed by the UK-based production crew at Rage Software,

takes the fun of rally-style driving and combines it with the excitement of competitive racing. Journeying through the most exotic locations of the African continent,

features 19 different circuit locales ranging from safari treks and lagoons, to the countryside and jungle. It also has a wide selection of officially licensed and internationally recognized vehicles (such as Ford, Mitsubishi, Subaru, Renault, and Pontiac among others), as well as a variety of single and multiplayer game modes and a three-dimensional surround sound presentation.
title: GTC Africa
rating_content: Suitable for Persons Ages Six and Older

description: A 3D incarnation of the beloved bombing action game series, Bomberman Generation feature fully cel-shaded graphics -- with more than 90 levels and five unique worlds, there's more sheer gameplay here than you'll ever be able to digest. Players will explore a huge 3D land, solving puzzles and fighting enormous boss foes. Using power-ups and bombs Bomberman will have to battle through 5 different worlds, holding 16 levels each.
title: Bomberman Generation

description:
ENDGAME combines pick up and play light gun action with stunning graphics, and cinematic action to deliver the ultimate next gen shoot-em-up.

ENDGAME is set in a world where Virtual Reality pioneered by EuroDream Technologies, is now commonplace, and is days from a new software update. But there is something very wrong with this update? Tyler knew what, but he was abducted; Octavian, an Artificial Intelligence, knows how to stop it, but needs a human. Only Jade Cornell knows what to do, and she has a gun?

In a dual bid to track Tyler and activate Octavian, Jade blasts across the United States of Europe. The deeper in she goes the more ruthless EuroDream security becomes. And still, Jade doesn't know the secret behind the security chief's identity, or realise Octavian is more complex than he seems.
title: Endgame

description: The world's wildlife population has been transformed in a series of shape-altering science experiments, and it's up to you to help the critters regain their regular forms. One of the most original and addicting puzzle games to come around in years, ZOOCUBE features near-3D graphics and a seemingly endless supply of levels. There are seven gameplay modes to master, and you can play alone or link up and square off against a friend. If only every puzzle game were this creative.
title: ZooCube

description: Use the amazing combo of moves provided to outwit the world's great female players.  Also, this game features different court surfaces, which also affect the bounce and spin of the ball.  Singles and Double friendlies can be played against any of the WTA stars.  Four major tournaments are offered, success in which will see the player rising through the WTA ranks.
title: WTA Tour Tennis

description: Red Card Soccer takes your traditional soccer video games and gives them a nice, swift kick. Fans will be treated to many modes of play including Friendly Mode, Party Mode and Cup Mode. Players can also expect to see 32 real-life soccer teams from around the world. 11-on-11 soccer action is on its way and it's going to more than just a walk in the park.
title: RedCard 20-03

description:
Stabbed in the back, left for dead in the streets outside of a European cafe Eike, the main character in Shadow of Destiny starts. Developed and published by Konami fans of the PlayStation 2 version might find the name Shadow of Destiny familiar as it was released on the system a while ago. While feeling the last ouch of life leaving him, Eike meets a supernatural being known only as Homuculus who restores his life. With new life Eike is given a device called digipad, which allows him to travel back in time. Using this device Eike must stop the many attempts on his life that took place before his death.

Stunning visuals, complex puzzles, riddles and plot twists await Eike as he tries to unravel the shroud of mystery cloaking his would-be killer.
title: Shadow of Destiny

description:
You are one of three air masters, Ciel, Copain and Femme, who are hired to protect the Eternal Engine.  This is an engine capable of perpetual motion in Sky Gunner but little do you realize that the diabolical criminal genius, Ventre, is planning to use the town's celebration aboard the luxury airship, Merveilleux, as an opportunity to steal the Eternal Engine for his own devilish purposes.

In Sky Gunner, play one of three pilots (Ciel, Femme, Copain) in an anime fantasy world with exotic flying machines. A unique avatism to target camera is employed to keep you focused on the dog-fighting.
title: Sky Gunner

description: Experience a legend in the making. Experience CIVILIZATION III where you match wits against the greatest leaders of the world in an all-out quest to build the ultimate empire. This journey of discovery includes new features that build on and enrich the Civilization experience. There are new pathways to explore, strategies to employ, and more powerful tools with which to build and manage your empire. Build, explore, conquer, and rule!!!
title: Sid Meier's Civilization III

description:
MLB SlugFest 20-03 uses advanced motion capture technology to clearly detail each player's facial expressions and reactions. The animations are so precise, gamers can view players on the field chewing gum, talking to one another and cheering for their teammates. While at the plate, gamers can dig in and unleash a mammoth blast clear out of the park.

To add to the authentic baseball delivered in MLB SlugFest 20-03, five-time MLB All-Star Alex Rodriguez will appear on the package cover and other advertising materials for the game. Entering his seventh full Major League Baseball season, the Texas Rangers shortstop also consulted with the development team on the game. Also stepping up to the plate is Roadrunner Records' recording act Dry Kill Logic, which recorded a hard-rockin', new millenium version of 'Take Me Out to the Ball Game' to accompany the game's aggressive attitude and extreme-style play.
title: MLB SlugFest 20-03

description:
You've created the Ultimate Ride with Ultimate Ride Coaster Deluxe--new from Disney Imagineering... now strap yourself in and experience the high-speed rush invented by your own twisted imagination!

Ultimate Ride Coaster Deluxe is the only real-time 3D ride attraction for the true roller coaster fan. Design, customize, test, ride and complete missions with a variety of roller coasters in your very own theme park.
title: Ultimate Ride Coaster Deluxe

description: Aero the Acrobat dazzles you with amazing feats of bravery in his mission to stop the evil Edgar Ektor. As Aero you blast out of cannons, dive through hoops of fire and hang onto speeding roller coasters to protect the circus park for the fun-loving spectators. But danger looms as you defy psycho circus performers and fairground freaks in the quest to save the show from disaster.
title: Aero the Acrobat

description: This might just be the most vicious race you'll ever enter. CARMAGEDDON returns, and this time there are more then 30 tracks to tear up and 10 amazing mission levels to traverse. Seven of the cars from the first installment return, and there are 33 new vehicles to whet your whistle. As with the first installment, hitting pedestrians is a big part of succeeding; 150 innocent bystanders are at your disposal this time around. With 90 new weapons to test out, incredible power-ups to help you in your destructive ways, and tons of hidden goodies, this is no stroll through the park.
title: Carmageddon 2: Carpocalypse Now

description: What do you do when your wingman falls from your plane engulfed in flames? There's no time to mourn, as you're under attack by a series of MiGs right off the bat in this detailed combat simulation. Fly over the expanses of Korea, enjoying four comprehensive modes of play. The most serious gameplay arena is Campaign mode a series of three scenarios that begin with your selection of a squadron and end with battles against the Koreans, Chinese, Japanese, and Russians. There even 31 complete training missions to get you up to speed.
title: Falcon 4.0

description: Age Of Empires is a real-time strategy game centered on historical civilizations and their respective struggles for dominance. You forage for food, gather resources like gold, rock and wood, and advance your race through the ages, all the while fending off enemies and instigating your own virtual genocide. You start off small, with nothing more than a town center and a few peasants and from this meager beginning slowly add infrastructure to your civilization that either enhances your resource gathering or pumps out tons of varied military units. It's a tried and true formula that has worked for a slew of real-time strategy games, perhaps none better than Age Of Empires.
title: Age of Empires

description: The future is grim, but this is no time to let depression get the best of you. It's just you against the computer, as you take on the role of J.C. Denton, the cybernetically altered enforcer of the United Nations Anti-Terrorist Coalition. Make your way through a dark underground using an allegiance of informers and undercover agents to help you expose the terrorists before they act. There are tons of items to discover, doors to unlock, and secret characters to find in this 3D epic. A great mix of combat and puzzle-solving, DEUS EX is a deeply involving gem of a game.
title: Deus Ex

description: The demon is back, and this time he's brought a few friends. Battle Diablo, Mephisto, and Baal throughout the dozens of dark environments in this involving classic. You'll travel across distant lands as the character of your choice fighting deadly villains and searching for treasure all the while. Diablo has vowed to destroy every man, demon, and angel, and you're the only hope of stopping him. The second installment in the touted 3D survival-horror series, DIABLO II boasts an incredible AI level, a new set of graphics to make your eyes bug, and truly gruesome gameplay.
title: Diablo II
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Animated Violence

description: FLY! is the ultimate flight simulator for beginners to experts. Cessna 172R, Piper Malibu Mirage, Piper Navajo Chieftain, Beechcraft King Air B200 and Raytheon Hawker 800XP are the five distinct aircrafts you have the pleasure of choosing from. Experience everything from avionics, to aircraft controls, to radio and GPS systems. These aircrafts were modeled to the exact specifications from the original aircraft and systems manufacturer. While navigating through the sky, there are five cities that show rich detail of scenery.  These cities are San Francisco, Los Angeles, Dallas, Chicago and New York. Configurable weather conditions include thunderstorms, snow, rain and volumetric clouds.
title: Fly!

description: A mystical eclipse overtakes the world, and an evil group of elves (which had been held captive by sunlight for so many years) escapes to wreak vicious havoc. Can you fend them off and return light your world? Choose to play as Jetrel the Warlock, Kite the Trickster, or Nanoc the Gladiator in this epic struggle between good and not-so-good. Three different combat styles let you get comfortable with the fighting, while 30 unique weapons give you tons of destructive options. Of course, none of this will exactly make things easy--you have to fight more than 30 enemies in this saga.
title: Dark Vengeance

description: Awakened to join an immortal group of wizards in the Circle of Evermore, you must restore balance to a world on the brink of collapse. The sequel to the award-winning Age of Wonders delivers an invigorating mix of empire building, role-playing, and warfare. Powerful spheres of magic are thrown against one another in a war of wizards the likes of which have never been seen before. By mastering magical forces of creation and dealing with the deities who govern them, you must establish a fantasy empire and confront other wizards in your quest to the Wizard's Throne.
title: Age of Wonders II: The Wizard's Throne

description: Downforce features arcade-style F1 racing in the future. From what we've seen, aside from the general theme of the game, expect the standard racing modes like Time Trial, Free Race, and a few different championship options. One multiplayer mode is original. In Tag mode you'll have to overtake your opponent and keep your lead for a certain amount of time to win the race. The game features at least seven courses, excellent graphics and realistic crash physics, even though the gameplay itself is much more arcade than your usual F1 simulation.
title: Downforce

description: Become one of 8 rebellious riders as you throttle a Sea-Doo over water that looks so real you?ll need a wetsuit! Just throw Splashdown into your Xbox video game system and you?ll instantly start blasting through the waters of Bali, tearing over the Great Barrier Reef, or stirring up the Venice Canals. Catch massive air as you jump wakes and launch off of ramps ? and pull insane stunts like the Metronome and the Cyclone. Then battle your way to the finish line through 18 incredibly detailed environments from all around the globe! For the wildest, most authentic water racing on the planet, Splashdown is your game.
title: Splashdown

description:
A fantasy role-playing game based on the 3rd edition Dungeons & Dragons rules. This RPG stays true to the pen-and-paper role-playing tradition, and allows you to play the 50+ hour campaign alone or online with your friends.

Also included in Neverwinter Nights is a full set of editing tools that you can use to build your own dungeons or entire adventures, which can also be shared and played online. You can even take control of the action as the Dungeon Master, and run the story in real time. There are

available for download, giving Neverwinter Nights almost limitless playability.
title: Neverwinter Nights

description: Sequel to the Game Boy Color titles, Bomberman Max 2 is also available in two versions: Blue and Red. Playing as either Bomberman (Blue version) or Max (Red version), players must once again battle the infamous Hige Hige bandits who have shrunk Bomberman and Max to the size of ants using their secret "Mini Mini" device. In order to return to their normal size, Bomberman and Max must drop bombs, complete puzzles, and destroy the devious shrinking device of their adversaries. Throughout the game, players collect, raise, and breed Charabom characters, then battle them against one another by utilizing the Link Cable.
title: Bomberman Max 2: Red Advance

description: Sequel to the Game Boy Color titles, Bomberman Max 2 is also available in two versions: Blue and Red. Playing as either Bomberman (Blue version) or Max (Red version), players must once again battle the infamous Hige Hige bandits who have shrunk Bomberman and Max to the size of ants using their secret "Mini Mini" device. In order to return to their normal size, Bomberman and Max must drop bombs, complete puzzles, and destroy the devious shrinking device of their adversaries. Throughout the game, players collect, raise, and breed Charabom characters, then battle them against one another by utilizing the Link Cable.
title: Bomberman Max 2: Blue Advance

description: Mature, third-person horror adventure from the makers of the original Legacy of Kain. Featuring 12 playable characters throughout history, including a Roman Centurion and a priest during the period of Inquisition, the story follows Alexandra Roivas, a young, beautiful woman whose grandfather's body has just been found in his dark and moody mansion, bloodied and torn apart, his head missing. When she learns that the local police have been unable to uncover any clues regarding the obvious murder, she decides to take matters into her own hands. It's when she arrives at her deceased relative's mansion to investigate that the tale of Eternal Darkness truly begins.
title: Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem

description: Play Stitch through multiple alien levels.
title: Stitch: Experiment 626

description: Part 3 in the vehicular first-person shooter series. Descent 3 starts off right where the warp-core exploded in Descent II. You miraculously survived the incident, only to be left floating in space, unconscious, headed right towards a sun. A PTMC mining ship snatches you just in time, but not for free. At the price of saving your life, you now have to endure some of the same duties you had to do in the first two Descent adventures, but with a whole lot more going on. Eradicating enemy mining bots is one of your goals, but your mission also includes the investigation behind the virus causing the malfunction of the mining bots' AI. Features 15 levels, 20 weapons, 30 new robots, and the new Fusion Engine, which allows travel inside structures and on the surface.
title: Descent 3

description: You've conquered the world of the 19th Century in IMPERIALISM, and now it's time to enter the Industrial Age. A complex strategic stew, IMPERIALISM II requires you to master production of goods, research of technology, trade, diplomacy, and purebred military conquest. An updated diplomatic model makes for more involved negotiations, and a new graphics engine delivers realistic-looking environments. The overall AI is a marked improvement over the original (which was no slouch), and the multiplayer options are outstanding. Now, this is a conquest.
title: Imperialism II: The Age of Exploration

description: The greatest spectacle in sports-entertainment is back! No other event in the history of wrestling has seen more legendary match-ups and classic championship battles that have forever changed the face of wrestling. No other event has revolutionized the world of wrestling with gripping drama and brutal intensity. No other event has epitomized Vince McMahon's vision of sports-entertainment. It can only mean one event: the infamous WrestleMania, where the baddest men on the planet meet to become the greatest champions of all time. It's where champions are made, Superstar legacies are born and heroes live on.
title: WWE WrestleMania X8
rating_content: Animated Violence, Suggestive Themes, Mild Lyrics

description: The expansion set StarCraft: Brood War continues the award-winning saga of galactic warfare as the Zerg, Protoss and Terrans struggle for their continued survival. With the shattered Zerg hive torn apart by fierce in fighting, the Protoss seek to reunite with their Dark Templar brethren and begin the rebuilding of their homeworld, Aiur. Terran Emperor Mengsk I, having achieved his goal of total power over the human colonies, must now turn his attention to both the rising power of the woman he betrayed Kerrigan, the infamous Zerg Queen of Blades and a conspiracy deep within his own ranks.
title: StarCraft: Brood War
rating_content: Animated Blood and Gore, Strong Language

description:
Delivering an intense real-time strategy experience to the PlayStation 2,

combines sword and sorcery action with rich story and character advancement. Developed by the former

creators at 7 Studios,

retells the story of King Arthur through 13 in-depth missions across a myriad of different landscapes. Each stage boasts primary and secondary objectives in addition to more than 100 different kinds of weapons, armor, and items to fight with. Magic using players can even wield in upwards of 20 different spells and veteran strategists can pit their wits against an advanced AI system that was more than three years in the making.
title: Legion: The Legend of Excalibur

description: Inspired by Sega's popular House of the Dead franchise, Pinball of the Dead challenges you to shoot, tilt, and flip your way across 3 boards in order to rescue citizens and destroy zombies. Each multi-tiered board is packed with challenges, hidden horrors, and vile bosses. Do you dare to enter the world of the Dead?
title: The Pinball of the Dead

description: Rise from rookie driver to hero of the silver screen. Have you got what it takes? In the world of stunt driving, fear is failure. One slip and your Hollywood dreams are over. The higher you climb, the higher the stakes. Grip the wheel, hit the gas, chase the glory
title: Stuntman

description:
Sony's massively popular and groundbreaking anti-gravity racing game has been refined and improved to take advantage of the technological abilities of the PlayStation 2 in

. Boasting a huge range of new features, tracks, and locations,

offers eight new teams from around the world, including 32 different ship models, 16 unique vehicle pilots, 45 different tracks, and seven various courses. Players can take advantage of six single-player modes, five multiplayer modes, and 26 kinds of weapons as they race their way through 2150's toughest racing league. Developed exclusively for the PlayStation 2.
title: WipEout Fusion

description: MechWarrior 4: Inner Sphere Mech Pack features four new Inner Sphere "Mechs," as selected by fans. The Inner Sphere Mech Pack release features updated technologies to confuse enemies and inflict maximum damage. The Pak also features a Coliseum multiplayer map where players fight against one another in a gladiator arena.
title: MechWarrior 4: Inner Sphere Mech Pak

description: Utilizing the Land Warrior engine, the stand-alone pack Delta Force: Task Force Dagger steps back into the Delta Force universe and adds a whole new level of gameplay. Choose from 10 different characters, each with their own abilities, and over 30 weapons. Play either single player or multiplayer and choose from 25 missions with realistic parameters. Delta Force: Task Force Dagger is back and it's better than ever.
title: Delta Force: Task Force Dagger

description: After becoming the Legend 1 of Porombo Island in the original game, Cody sets off to a new land, and a new tournament. Things take a turn for the worse when a violent storm destroys Cody?s boat, and sends him adrift at sea. He awakens inside a shack in the land of Majiko?but all is not well. He discovers that the nearby lands are being terrorized by the Maskman and his cronies. In order to put things right, Cody must travel back 20 years into the past and back again.
title: Robopon 2: Ring Version

description: In MEDAL OF HONOR ALLIED ASSAULT, you are Lt. Mike Powell, member of the famed 1st Ranger Battalion. Following your recruitment by the OSS, you'll battle through over 20 challenging levels, based on historical military campaigns of World War II.
title: Medal of Honor: Allied Assault

description: The season for digital birdie hunting is underway.
title: Birdie Shoot

description: Budget-priced high-action title that pits players in the cockpit of a military helicopter to indulge in dozens of day and night-based missions, all of which takes place in real world locations. Players take the helm of two distinct choppers and fly attack and rescue missions in 18 different levels. The game features four campaigns in a variety of environments including the Swiss Alps, Arizona Desert, Amazon Jungle and the Arctic Circle. Players blast opponents with the help of high-tech weaponry, including EMP weapons, rail guns, homing missiles, and special turbo upgrades that give the helicopter jet aircraft capabilities.
title: Fireblade
rating_content: Animated Violence, Realistic Violence, Blood and Gore

description:
Men in Black 2: Alien Escape is a fast-paced third-person perspective action game liberally infused with the trademark humor of the smash 1997 movie
and the upcoming sequel.  The game is divided into five distinct episodes, including a Nuclear Station, the Docks and the streets of Manhattan.  All episodes include numerous levels and challenges to complete prior to progressing through the game.
title: Men In Black II: Alien Escape

description: The fun has evolved into prehistoric pandemonium as you add dinosaurs to your zoo with the Zoo Tycoon: Dinosaur Digs expansion pack! Zookeepers will be envious as you let your imagination run wild building the most vibrant and beautiful zoo with dinosaurs and ice age beasts. Manage more than 20 new awe-inspiring creatures including the T-rex, Velociraptor, and Sabre-tooth cat while keeping your animals and guests happy and you will be a Zoo Tycoon!
title: Zoo Tycoon: Dinosaur Digs

description: Muscle your way to the front and enjoy every heart-stopping moment as you battle for every inch of track against the superstars of the sport. With authentic driver controls, you experience life in the cockpit with the same technological wizardry available to this season?s Formula One racers, or switch off the controls and rely on your raw driving skills. Take the wheel in F1 2002 and take aim at the 2002 Formula One World Championship.
title: F1 2002

description:
You are Otto Matic, the robot who, in the year 1957, is given the job of saving Earth from the clutches of The Giant Brain from Planet X. You must rescue as many humans as you can while defeating the Brain Aliens and all of their evil followers. Your mission will take you to strange and fantastic alien worlds which are often treacherous and will require Otto to perform amazing feats.

Your rocket ship will take you to each of the planets, starting with Earth. While on each planet you must save as many humans as you can, but be careful because the Brain Aliens will try to abduct the humans before you can save them. When you save humans, they are teleported to your rocket ship. To escape the planet you must also collect rocket fuel. Once The Giant Brain has been defeated and peace restored to the galaxy, you will return to Earth with your human cargo where they will be freed.
title: OttoMatic

description:
Assimilation is an addictive board game. By cloning, jumping or warping your counters, the aim is to assimilate your opponents and take over the entire board. Play on 10 different boards against up to eight opponents, depending on the size of the board.

Single-player mode features three levels of AI difficulty, from Novice to an extremely difficult Expert mode. Multiplayer modes allow you to take on eight different opponents.
title: Assimilation

description: In the Magic Online game, players will be able to purchase digital cards and trade them with other players, build and customize their decks and organize their card collection right on their PCs. A wide range of game rooms will allow players of different levels to find just the right environment for them, from casual pick-up games to highly competitive tournaments.  All of the cards from the 7th Edition and Invasion forward are included, along with secure online trading and easy collection management.
title: Magic: The Gathering Online

description: For the first time ever, Bruce Lee fans will be able to play as the legendary martial arts master on a next-generation video game console.  The game features an epic storyline in which Bruce battles multiple enemies to rescue his kidnapped father and retrieve the mystical Golden Relic, keeper of ancient martial arts secrets. The action spans more than 40 areas set in locales around the world including Hong Kong and San Francisco. The game features a variety of martial arts styles, including Jeet Kune Do, the discipline started by Bruce Lee himself.
title: Bruce Lee: Quest of the Dragon

description:
It's been nearly fifteen years since the war between the orcs and humans ended. An uneasy peace settled over the land. While the defeated orcish clans regrouped under the banner of a new visionary leader, a darker shadow has fallen over the world, threatening to extinguish all life and all hope.

The classic real-time strategy world of Warcraft returns for a third installment, which features four unique races, brilliant three-dimensional graphics, legendary heroes, and new multiplayer features, including shared unit control and resource trading between players.
title: Warcraft III: Reign of Chaos

description: Get ready to break a few records, because this is the fastest-paced F1 racing game ever bar none. Detailing the complete 2002 season, F1 2002 includes the all-new Toyota F1 and Renault F1 teams. Of course, all of the other teams are also here, and they're ready to roll. Amazing 3D graphics and unparalleled physics set this game above similar fare, and the classic Challenge mode has been complete reworked for this installment. Challenge the computer, or see how your skills stack up against a friend's.
title: F1 2002

description: Play the craziest soccer you can imagine? the LEGO way!  In a World Cup year, LEGO brings you an action-packed, madcap soccer game!  Soccer Mania offers stunning graphics, fast-paced arcade style gameplay and all the color, fun and creativity that LEGO brings.
title: LEGO Soccer Mania

description:
You are Otto Matic, the robot who, in the year 1957, is given the job of saving Earth from the clutches of The Giant Brain from Planet X. You must rescue as many humans as you can while defeating the Brain Aliens and all of their evil followers. Your mission will take you to strange and fantastic alien worlds which are often treacherous and will require Otto to perform amazing feats.

Your rocket ship will take you to each of the planets, starting with Earth. While on each planet you must save as many humans as you can, but be careful because the Brain Aliens will try to abduct the humans before you can save them. When you save humans, they are teleported to your rocket ship. To escape the planet you must also collect rocket fuel. Once The Giant Brain has been defeated and peace restored to the galaxy, you will return to Earth with your human cargo where they will be freed.
title: OttoMatic

description: Skin, fur, and heavy metal! Barbarian is an arena based fighting game with 11 playable characters, each with their own unique weapons and fighting abilities. Defeat your opponents in rich interactive environments as you collect bloodstones to enhance fighting skills.
title: Barbarian
rating_content: Animated Violence, Realistic Violence, Suggestive Themes

description: NASCAR Heat Advance lets players strap themselves into a 750 hp stock car and enjoy all the thrills and spills of NASCAR Winston Cup Series racing anywhere. Whether it's the innovative Beat The Heat challenges or the all-new Career Mode, NASCAR Heat Advance promises to put the pedal to the metal and dust its competition. In fact, NASCAR Heat 2002 is the first NASCAR game for the hand-held system to provide race fans with the ability to see the entire car on the racetrack, not just the back of the car view that has been the only view available until now.
title: NASCAR Heat 2002

description: A corrupting plague of dark magic grips the worlds of the gnomes, nymphs, elves and trolls. Once lush lands have turned barren and the inhabitants have become hostile mutant creatures. Now, it's up to the magic of a unique young unicorn and the power of an old troll mage to team up, take on and transform enemies in a desperate attempt to defeat the plague and return the lands and races to their former glory.
title: Pryzm: Chapter One: The Dark Unicorn

description: The seventh in the acclaimed Three Kingdoms series, Romance VII allows players to assume the role of 535 different characters and five classes across ten scenarios with multiple endings.
title: Romance of the Three Kingdoms VII

description:
Finally, a videogame that understands soccer really is a contact sport.

RedCard 20-03's unique adrenaline-style gameplay lets you kick, score, celebrate and tackle your way through 50 international teams all vying for the Cup Championship.

The unique Midway Sports-style experience combined with lightning game speed, stunning next-generation graphics and authentic soccer action make RedCard 20-03 the must-have soccer title on the next-gen systems.

title: RedCard 20-03

description: Tetris comes to the Xbox with new game modes, six different worlds, up to four people on multiplayer, and all the gaming magic that addicted you to the original game.
title: Tetris Worlds
platforms: Xbox PS2 GBA GCN GCN PC Xbox Cell WinPhone

description: An epic 3D quest/adventure game where players assume the role of either sea captain Faust or smuggler Jazz and engage on a quest for lost treasure and riches in a beautifully rendered 3D Ancient Eastern environment. Traveling through three picturesque worlds, players communicate with the various inhabitants, thus revealing the game?s story, objectives, quests and puzzles.  Each of the three worlds many marvelously rendered scenes give the feeling of playing inside a living painting, creating a rich and immersive story world for players to enjoy.
title: Jazz and Faust

description:
Occasionally strange but completely addictive, Nintendo's Animal Crossing for the GameCube is not so much a game as a simulation of life on a small town. Players begin the game by setting out to live life on their own in a colorful town, where they are greeted by a seemingly endless supply of things to do and characters to meet.

Time passes in Animal Crossing in real-time, as the month, day, season, and time of day matches that of the player's. Holiday seasons come and go in Animal Crossing, just as they would in the real world. Experience the freedom to fish, decorate your house, go bug catching, garden, write letters, and even play original Nintendo NES games in this imaginative, and addictive game.
title: Animal Crossing

description: Return to the frozen North of the Forgotten Realms, for more dungeon-crawling adventure. A generation after the original game, hordes of goblins, orcs, and bugbears under the banner of the Chimera threaten Targos, the port of the Ten Towns. Your party begins trying to save Targos and must learn the cause of this new war. Fifty new spells and a plethora of new magical items will be available to the adventurers. Some features from Baldur's Gate II will also be added like 3D technology, dual-wielding, classes (Barbarian, Sorceror, Monk), and class kits. Icewind Dale will include novel kits like Mercenary, Votary, Giant Killer, and Dreadmaster of Bane, as well as new subraces like Drow, Gold Dwarves, and Tieflings.
title: Icewind Dale II
rating_content: Blood, Mild Language, Use of Alcohol

description: A multiplayer party game for all ages, Pac-Man Fever stars Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man and many other Namco favorites from popular franchises such as Tekken, Ridge Racer and Soul Calibur. Up to four players partake in more than 30 mini-games and three differently themed game boards. Your performance in the mini-games marks your progress on the board whether you win or not. Try to recover all of the mini-games stolen by those pesky, party-crashing Ghosts and determine who the real party animal is!
title: Pac-Man Fever

description: In Power Rangers Wild Force for Game Boy Advance, young gamers will play as their favorite Power Ranger, this time armed with the strength and characteristics of the Power Animals including the Bison, Tiger, Shark, Eagle and Lion. The top-down, 3D exploration adventure allows players to take on the Org, an ancient race of villains who are out to destroy the balance of nature.
title: Power Rangers: Wild Force

description: Blade II is the only next-generation action/adventure combat-fest that allows you to be Blade, the half-vampire, half-human superhero who lives to rid the world of vanpires. Armed with an arsenal of deadly weapons and over-the-top martial arts moves, you must stop the vampire underworld from farming humans for their soul's by exploiting Blade's vampire abilities to defeat enemies with extreme authority.
title: Blade II
rating_content: Animated Violence, Realistic Violence, Strong Language, Blood and Gore

description: Commandos 2: Men of Courage is a tactical action/strategy game set against the backdrop of World War II. Take control of an elite group of commandos who must venture deep into enemy territory and utilize their combined expertise to complete a series of mission-based objectives. Go covert into new environments based on authentic WWII locations: the heart of the third Reich, a northern European submarine installation, the headquarters of the Japanese army and more.  Players have access to a variety of weapons and vehicles, including jeeps, tanks, trucks, ships, bazookas and flame-throwers. The game features authentic WWII scenarios with 10 missions spanning nine different environments in night and day.
title: Commandos 2: Men of Courage

This fifth installment of the comic-based FPS series explores the story of how Tal'Set became the man he is in this prequel,

. Players can run, jump, climb, swim or sneak through the levels, blowing away prehistoric foes with an all-new arsenal of weapons, including Variable Payload Cruise Missiles, Gravity Disrupter Beams, and the Swarm Bore. Other new features include squad dynamic-powered troops that actually take cover and establish strategic positions, aerial missions on a fully armed Pterosaur with surface attacks and dogfights, expansive living jungle environments, and simultaneous two-player split-screen action.
title: Turok: Evolution

description: Fourth (numbered) installment in the comic-based FPS series explores the story of how original Turok Tal'Set became the man he is. White fighting his nemesis Captain Tobias Bruckner in 1886 Texas, the two fall into a rift between their world and the Lost Lands, a mysterious place full of civil upheaval and much danger. Thus the adventure of Turok: Evolution begins as Tal'Set continues to seek revenge on the wicked Bruckner in the middle of the tumultuous world. Players run, jump, climb, swim or sneak through the levels, blowing away prehistoric foes with an all-new arsenal of weapons, including Variable Payload Cruise Missiles, Gravity Disrupter Beams, and the Swarm Bore.
title: Turok: Evolution
